interestingcomments.content: Dust, please help /!/ Dear fellow LeicaMen, I have Leica m10monochrom and m10P, on both I tend to change the lenses couple of times a day but with as much caution as possible. However, dust still seems to go on my sensor as in every photo above 5.6F I notice dark spots. Is there a solution to this? Do you clean your sensors yourself? How often do you clean them? Thank you so much for your help!
